# preferredDataSource

**Instance Property**

The preferred audio data source for the port.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredDataSource: AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property indicates the data source selected using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSessionPortDescription/setPreferredDataSource(_:)] method. To see the actual data source, use the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSessionPortDescription/selectedDataSource] property.

If `nil`, the port doesn’t support selecting between multiple data sources, or no preferred data source has been selected.

## Managing a Port’s Data Sources

- **dataSources**: The available data sources for the port.
- **selectedDataSource**: The currently selected audio data source for the port.
- **setPreferredDataSource(_:)**: Sets the preferred audio data source for the port.
